config_description: /** * Database setting OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES (default: true). * Optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is used to optimize expressions of the form (SELECT A) to A. In the code snippet provided, the configuration is checked in the if condition 'session.getDatabase().getSettings().optimizeSimpleSingleRowSubqueries'. If the configuration is enabled, the query is optimized by getting the single row expression and decrementing the query level before optimizing it.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the configuration OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES depends on the usage of queries with subqueries in the system. If there are many queries with simple single row subqueries, then this configuration will be triggered more frequently.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the configuration option OPTIMIZE_SIMPLE_SINGLE_ROW_SUBQUERIES is that it can improve the performance of queries by optimizing simple single row subqueries. This can lead to faster query execution and potentially reduce resource consumption in the system.
